Package com.lmax.solana4j.api

Interface MessageVisitor.V0InstructionView

All Superinterfaces:
MessageVisitor.InstructionView
All Known Implementing Classes:
SolanaV0InstructionView
Enclosing interface:
MessageVisitor<T>
public static interface MessageVisitor.V0InstructionView extends MessageVisitor.InstructionView
Interface representing a version 0 instruction view in the Solana blockchain.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    List<PublicKey>
    accounts(List<AddressLookupTable> addressLookupTables)
    Returns the list of accounts for the instruction, using the address lookup tables to map the indexes stored in the message to actual addresses
    PublicKey
    program(List<AddressLookupTable> addressLookupTables)
    Returns the public key of the program for the instruction, using the address lookup tables to map the indexes stored in the message to actual addresses

    Methods inherited from interface com.lmax.solana4j.api.MessageVisitor.InstructionView

    accountIndexes, data, programIndex

  • Method Details

    • accounts

      List<PublicKey> accounts(List<AddressLookupTable> addressLookupTables) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Returns the list of accounts for the instruction, using the address lookup tables to map the indexes stored in the message to actual addresses
      Parameters:
      addressLookupTables - the list of address lookup tables
      Returns:
      a list of PublicKey objects representing the accounts
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the address lookup tables provided do not map to any of the lookup accounts in the message

    • program

      PublicKey program(List<AddressLookupTable> addressLookupTables) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Returns the public key of the program for the instruction, using the address lookup tables to map the indexes stored in the message to actual addresses
      Parameters:
      addressLookupTables - the list of address lookup tables
      Returns:
      the PublicKey of the program
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the address lookup tables provided do not map to any of the lookup accounts in the message
